name: Lofty Tower's Fashionable Canvas
description: The standard interior walls of a lofty tower, built from a time-tested brick-and-stone structure for both durability and ease of maintenance. The designer intentionally left a blank space in the center which has been surrounded by relief carvings and metallic ornamentation, offering the homeowner a canvas for their own creative freedom. After all, expressing one's unique take on current trends and fashion through graffiti or other decorative means is an indispensable part of the Natlanese lifestyle...
